attacks.name: Darkness Roar
attacks.effect: You may have your opponent switch the Defending Pokémon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Sleep Hole
attacks.effect: If the Defending Pokémon is Asleep, this attack does 40 damage plus 40 more damage. If the Defending Pokémon is not Asleep, that Pokémon is now Asleep.
